title: Consider the electron pairs around Nitrogen
text: Think about both bonding and non-bonding pairs of electrons around the Nitrogen atom. How might they influence the shape?

title: Determine the hybridization
text: What is the hybridization of an atom with three bonding regions?

title: Relate shape to hybridization
text: Once you know the hybridization, can you deduce the shape from it?

title: Observe the molecular structure
text: Look at the arrangement of atoms connected to the highlighted Nitrogen atom. How many atoms are attached?

title: Consider electron pairs
text: Do not forget to count the lone pairs on the Nitrogen along with the bonded atoms. How does this affect the shape?

title: Identify the VSEPR geometry
text: With the total number of electron pairs, which VSEPR shape corresponds to that configuration?
